Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Bladedance: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodbath: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Braver: Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,400.
Class_Skill_Desc_Enpi: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.</br>Enhanced Enpi Bonus Potency: 260//</br>Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10//
Class_Skill_Desc_Feint: Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Fuga: Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Fuko: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Class_Skill_Desc_Gekko: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Yukikaze or Hyosetsu</br>※Action changes to Mangetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hagakure: Converts Setsu, Getsu, and Ka into Kenki. Each Sen converted increases your Kenki Gauge by 10. Can only be executed if under the effect of at least one of the three statuses.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hakaze: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Higanbana: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 45</br>Duration: 60s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Meditation, up to a maximum of 3</br>//</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Chiten: Reduces damage taken by 25% and delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000 every time you suffer damage.</br>Duration: 5s</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Kuzushi</br>Kuzushi Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 25%</br>Duration: 4s
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Guren: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25</br>Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Senei.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Gyoten: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 10</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Kyuten: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Senei: Delivers an attack with a potency of 860.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25</br>Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Guren.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Shinten: Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 25
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Soten: Swiftly charges forward, dealing damage with a potency of 4,000 to targets in your path.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Kaiten</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Yukikaze changes to Hyosetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※Gekko changes to Mangetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※Kasha changes to Oka while under the effect of Kaiten.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hissatsu: Yaten: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: 10-yalm backstep</br>Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Enpi</br>Duration: 15s</br>Kenki Gauge Cost: 10</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hyosetsu: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 2s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Iaijutsu: Executes a weaponskill depending on current number of Sen stored in Sen Gauge.</br>1 Sen: Higanbana</br>2 Sen: Tenka Goken</br>3 Sen: Midare Setsugekka
Class_Skill_Desc_Ikishoten: Increases Kenki Gauge by 50.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Ogi Namikiri Ready</br>Duration: 30s</br>//Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Jinpu: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120.</br>Combo Action: Hakaze</br>Combo Potency: 280</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu</br>Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%</br>Duration: 40s</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Kaeshi: Goken: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kaeshi: Higanbana: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 45</br>Duration: 60s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with Higanbana.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kaeshi: Namikiri: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Potency is increased by 50% when attacking only a single target.</br>Combo Action: Ogi Namikiri</br>Additional Effect: When attacking two or more targets, creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kaeshi: Setsugekka: Delivers a critical hit with a potency of 640.</br>Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Kasha: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Combo Action: Gekko or Mangetsu</br>※Action changes to Oka while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mangetsu: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Yukikaze or Hyosetsu</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Meditate: Gradually increases your Kenki Gauge.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants stacks of Meditation when used in combat, up to a maximum of 3</br>//Kenki Gauge not affected when used outside battle.</br>Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.
Class_Skill_Desc_Meikyo Shisui: Grants Meikyo Shisui and Midare.</br>Meikyo Shisui Effect: Nullifies status afflictions that can be removed by Purify</br>Duration: 3s</br>Midare Duration: 10s</br>※Action changes to Midare Setsugekka while under the effect of Midare.
Class_Skill_Desc_Midare Setsugekka: Delivers an attack with a potency of 16,000.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Midare.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Mineuchi: Deals damage to target equal to 10% of their current HP.</br>Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage.</br>Deals damage with a potency of 4,000 to players riding machina and non-player combatants.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 2s
Class_Skill_Desc_Ogi Namikiri: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Potency is increased by 50% when attacking only a single target.</br>Additional Effect: When attacking two or more targets, creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency</br>Duration: 10s</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Kaeshi: Namikiri upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Oka: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Gekko or Mangetsu</br>Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Shifu: Delivers an attack with a potency of 120.</br>Combo Action: Hakaze</br>Combo Potency: 280</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka</br>Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%</br>Duration: 40s</br>Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5//
Class_Skill_Desc_Shoha: Delivers an attack with a potency of 560.</br>Can only be executed after accumulating three stacks of Meditation by executing Iaijutsu, Meditate, or Ogi Namikiri/or Meditate while in combat.</br>Meditation effect fades upon execution.</br>Shares a recast timer with Shoha II.
Class_Skill_Desc_Shoha II: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200 to all nearby enemies.</br>Can only be executed after accumulating three stacks of Meditation by executing Iaijutsu, Meditate, or Ogi Namikiri/or Meditate while in combat.</br>Meditation effect fades upon execution.</br>Shares a recast timer with Shoha.
Class_Skill_Desc_Tenka Goken: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Meditation, up to a maximum of 3</br>//</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Third Eye: Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.</br>Duration: 4s</br>Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit//
Class_Skill_Desc_True North: Nullifies all action direction requirements.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Tsubame-gaeshi: Repeats the previously executed iaijutsu.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>//Can only be executed immediately following Iaijutsu.</br>Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.
Class_Skill_Desc_Yukikaze: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※Action changes to Hyosetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Zantetsuken: Swiftly charges forward, dealing damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 24,000.</br>If target is afflicted with Kuzushi, deals damage equal to 100% of their maximum HP.</br>Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage.</br>The additional effect of Kuzushi cannot be applied to players riding machina and non-player combatants.</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 120s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Status_Desc_Bloodbath: Attacks generate HP equal to the amount of physical damage dealt.
Class_Status_Desc_Chiten: Damage taken is reduced while countering attacks.
Class_Status_Desc_Feint: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Feint.
Class_Status_Desc_Higanbana: Open wounds are bleeding, causing damage over time. HP recovery is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Kaeshi: Namikiri: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Meikyo Shisui: Nullifying status afflictions that can be removed by Purify.
Class_Status_Desc_Ogi Namikiri: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Yukikaze: Sustaining increased damage from target who executed Yukikaze.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Fugetsu and Fu: Improves Fugetsu's damage increase to 13% and Fuka's reduction to weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay to 13%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Iaijutsu: Reduces Iaijutsu cast time to 1.3 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Ikishoten: Grants Ogi Namikiri Ready upon execution of Ikishoten.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Meikyo Shisui: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Meikyo Shisui.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Tsubame-gaeshi: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Tsubame-gaeshi.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Kenki Mastery: Increases Kenki Gauge when landing select weaponskills or when taking damage while under the effect of Third Eye.
Class_Trait_Desc_Kenki Mastery II: Increases Kenki Gauge when landing all weaponskills excluding Iaijutsu.
Class_Trait_Desc_Way of the Samurai: Increases the potency of Hakaze to 200, Jinpu to 120, and Shifu to 120.
Class_Trait_Desc_Way of the Samurai II: Increases the potency of Gekko, Kasha, and Yukikaze to 120.
